documents.document: Fabulous Regent Beijing We stayed three nights in a deluxe room at the Regent, during our 10 day vacation in China.We had a perfect stay. Beautiful hotel, gorgeous well equipped room, great breakfast buffet, gorgeous western style restaurants, courteous and prompt service. Nice gym, the swimming pool is out of this world.This is one of the most beautiful hotels we have stayed in anywhere in the world. You won't be disappointed.
